dict.acceptation: 哪一个；哪一些；哪个；那，指前面提到的事物；

sent.orig: The twins are so alike that I can't tell which is which.
sent.trans: 这对双胞胎一模一样，我分辨不出谁是谁。

sent.orig: We do not know which behavioural traits are inherited and which acquired.
sent.trans: 我们不知道哪些行为特征是遗传的，哪些是后天养成的。

sent.orig: "The Yongle Canon", compiled by 2,000 scholars and completed in 1408, A.D., was the world's earliest and biggest encyclopaedia, which contains 22937 volumes bound into 11095 books with a total of 370 million Chinese characters.
sent.trans: 中国的《永乐大典》是世界上最早最大的百科全书。 它成书于1408年， 共有22，937卷， 11，095册 37，000万字， 由2，000名学者编写。

sent.orig: A Russian might fail to see anything amusing in a joke which would make an Englishman laugh to tears.
sent.trans: 俄国人可能看不出会使英国人笑出泪来的笑话有什么可笑之处。

sent.orig: A catalyst is a substance which speeds up a chemical reaction.
sent.trans: 催化剂是一种能加速化学反应的物质。
